Release the full power of the mongo shell with Studio 3T

<br/>

     display: block;

    color: #47B648;

     font-weight: bold;
   }
</style>  

<p class="text-primary">Write MongoDB queries faster with IntelliShell, Studio 3T's built-in mongo shell.</p>
<p>IntelliShell autocompletes:</p>
<ul>
  <li>
    <p>JavaScript standard library functions</p>
  </li>
  <li>
    <p>shell-specific types and methods</p>
  </li>
  <li>
    <p>operators</p>
  </li>
<li>
    <p>collection names</p>
  </li>
<li>
    <p>field names</p>
  </li>
<li>
    <p>shell helper commands... and more</p>
  </li>
</ul>
<p>In addition to robust autocompletion, enjoy other features like code reformatting, commenting and uncommenting, opening and saving queries, just to name a few. </p>

<h3>Need a more powerful GUI? Try Robo 3T's sibling, Studio 3T:</h3><br/>

<a class="button" href="https://studio3t.com/download/?utm_source=intellishell&utm_medium=welcomepage&utm_campaign=inapp-robo3t">Download Studio 3T</a>
